PROTECT THE FUN–Say 'yes' to more outdoor fun!

product_description: The sun can be hard on your skin. Banana Boat Moisturizing After Sun Lotion helps to moisturize and replenish dry skin leaving you feeling smooth and soft. This after sun care lotion is free from oxybenzone and formulated with aloe and vitamin E to preserve your skin and extend your tan. It provides the relief your skin needs to protect against the drying effects of the sun, wind, and water.

name: Aloderma 96% Organic Aloe Vera Gel for Face & Body, Pure Aloe Gel Made within 12 Hours of Harvest, Ideal for Skin, Scalp, & Hair Hydration, Calming Moisturizer for Soothing After Sun Care, 7.05oz
short_description: Made Within 12 Hours of Harvest: At Aloderma, our skincare is rooted in the earth. Our 100% Pure Organic Aloe Vera is grown on our organic farms, processed on-site and turned into final products within hours of leaving the fields to ensure that we capture the natural power of Aloe Vera in every product we make.

Aloderma: We are a family run organic farm-to-face skin care line focused on producing and creating high-quality 100% organic aloe vera-based products in an ecologically friendly way. Our farms and factory are certified USDA and European Union organic by ECOCERT and certified sustainable. Aloderma has over 20 years of working with Aloe providing high quality and affordable products for beauty, health and wellness.

Pure Aloe Vera Gel: Aloderma Pure Aloe Gel is made with 100% pure organic aloe and combined with hydrating ingredients to make a fast-acting moisturizer to restore skin's natural balance and hydration. It provides intense hydration for a plump and supple complexion. It’s lightweight and fast-absorbing and it’s suitable for all skin types.

Multifunctional: Our pure aloe vera gel will calm and cool your skin after sun exposure or just when it is need of a pick-me-up. Its natural and gentle formula soothes skin irritation and nourishes dry skin, scalps, and hair. It has cooling and calming properties to help reduce redness and provide support for your hair, skin and scalp regardless of season.

Radiant Beauty: Enhance your natural beauty with our nourishing gel, providing balance of hydration and radiance to your skin. Our nourishing and refreshing aloe gel helps maintain skin's natural balance and pH levels. It helps to reduce dryness and flaking, leaving skin feeling soft and supple.

name: PURA D'OR 16 Oz ORGANIC Aloe Vera Gel - Unscented - All Natural - ZERO Artificial Preservatives - Deeply Hydrating & Moisturizing - Sunburn, Bug Bites, Rashes, Small Cuts, Eczema Relief - Skin & Hair
short_description: THE ONLY USDA ORGANIC ALOE VERA GEL ON THE MARKET: PURA D'OR is the Only USDA Certified Organic Aloe Vera Gel on the market currently that has ZERO artificial preservatives and does NOT require refrigeration. Other brands are missing USDA Organic Seal on the Label which means they are not Certified Organic and any Organic claims made elsewhere are misleading and inaccurate. Always check for USDA Seal on Label

SOOTHING SKIN HYDRATION: Our Aloe Vera Gel will double the versatile moisturizing benefits and will deeply penetrate your skin with superior hydration for clearer and healthier skin - leaving it feeling and looking fresh and revitalized.

RELIEVE SUN DAMAGED SKIN: Our after sun care Aloe Vera Gel will give your skin a soothing relief from environmental factors and will leave your skin silky soft and smooth without any gooey or sticky residue.

NOURISHING and REFRESHING BENEFITS FOR SKIN, HAIR AND SCALP: Our Organic Aloe Vera Gel is rich in antioxidants and nutrients including Vitamins C and E to improve the natural firmness of the skin and reducing the appearance of early aging in skin. Aloe Vera Gel for hair (as well as for scalp) promotes moisturize your hair and scalp for silkier, softer, and shinier hair - all the while providing your scalp with much-needed hydration to encourage a less itchy and flaky scalp.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Healthy Skin, Happy Customers. We offer a Satisfaction Guarantee. If you are unsatisfied with our Aloe Vera Gel, please let us know and we will give you a FULL refund.
product_description: PURA D’OR Aloe Vera Gel is a versatile, all-around nutrient-rich gel that provides the ultimate form of nourishment to your skin and hair. With our cold-pressed Aloe Vera Gel, you can leave the house feeling fresh and clean - without the greasy, sticky residue - because of the incredible hydrating properties found within our gel that help moisturize your skin for healthier, shinier, and more youthful skin. Aloe Vera is rich in Vitamin C & E, the most important antioxidants in promoting healthier hair and skin by increasing the natural firmness of the skin to keep its vibrant appearance. It’s also great for soothing dry, itchy, sunburnt skin that’s been exposed to the environment and the elements. Use it for hair and scalp as well as the nutrients found within the gel encourages softer, silkier hair as well as a way to soothe irritated and flaky scalps. Our Aloe Vera Gel is gentle and free from harsh ingredients and cruelty-free. All PURA D’OR products are produced and bottled in our environmentally conscious Southern California facilities.
